Author: thr0wawaynametaken
Text: i feel like you should be allowed autonomy over what you eat - locking up food is never going to create a healthy environment for people in the house, and you are definitely old enough to make lunches and make rational choices about what to have for lunch on your own.  that being said, i've wasted so much of my college experience because of my ed. i've made few friends, i've skipped classes to purge, i would try to study but be so distracted by thoughts of food that nothing registered, i had to take a semester off to go inpatient. i hope you don't waste it like i have and actually enjoy a full life while in college
